allow: Bash(node -e "const mysql = require(''mysql2/promise''); require(''dotenv'').config(); mysql.createConnection({ host: process.env.DB_HOST, user: process.env.DB_USER, password: process.env.DB_PASSWORD, database: process.env.DB_NAME }).then(async (conn) => { const [rows] = await conn.query(''SHOW TABLES''); console.log(''Tables:'', rows); const [desc] = await conn.query(''DESCRIBE follower_counts'').catch(e => { console.log(''Table does not exist''); return [[]]; }); console.log(''follower_counts structure:'', desc); await conn.end(); }).catch(e => console.error(''Error:'', e.message));")
